post_title: SOLD: Rube Waddell Portrait  Sweet Caporal 150/30 w/ writing on front
post_content:
SOLD: Rube Waddell Portrait 
Sweet Caporal 150 Factory No.30

Asking $245 obo includes USPS Ground Advantage shipping
Payment by PayPal g/s, Venmo or Zelle.

Please be aware that the signature is not authentic, and therefore, the item is being sold as "writing on front." I reached out to SGC and PSA, and they confirmed that they will not encapsulate the item in its current state. Additionally, JSA has determined that the writing is not a genuine signature.

Comment or DM with any offers or questions.
Thank you,
Robert
